page.title: 13LOCAL OPINION
page.content: Residents of Oulton Broad are satisfied with the standards of local education.They are also satisfied with the recreation facilites and the number of post boxes and public telephones.The number of public houses,cafes and restaurants is good, for the size of Oulton Broad, sports and recreation facilites are well catered for in all age groups, and the church and religion were described as "not snooty". The majority of people considered the broads and surrounding area very good for tourism. Housing and the buliding of new homes ws not considered to be sufficient.Most people were happy with the local policing and health service,and the local public transport, road and rail. The amount of both indoor and outdoor entertainment is good and varied.
